summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2746, for the improvement of the alley in block 17, Law's Addition to the City of Seattle, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt or other suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation; under Ordinance No. 32729 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
